Considering its worth and the value it holds for you, I am offering it to you for $14,000. This price not only reflects its true value but also allows us to come to an agreement that benefits both parties. I look forward to hearing your response soon. Best regards, Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,000.
